name: 黃柏鈞
objective:
This course establishes the practical tools and know-how for microcomputers. Students can expect to have the basic proficiency of system programming, OS development, and CPU development.

NOTE: This course will be mostly given in English. All materials will be given in English. Students must have their own copy of textbook No. 1 to well participate this course.
schedule:
1. Review of computer organization and architecture
2. Assembly language
3. Write your own OS
4. Write your own CPU
5. Overview of embedded system
6. uC-OS II overview
7. System instrumentation tools
8. Performance measurement and benchmarking
scorePolicy:
Homework assignments: 20%
Midterm exam: 25%
Final project or final exam: 30%
In-class participation: 25%
materials:
1. Randall Hyde, The Art of Assembly Language, 2nd Edition, No Starch Press, 2010.
2. Kip R. Irvine, Assembly Language for x86 Processors, 7th Edition, Pearson, 2014.
3. 雷思磊，自己動手寫CPU，電子工業出版社。
